subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: How much longer will the likes of John Isner and Marin Cilic be required to play 22 games in the final set of a Wimbledon match to decide a winner?
snippet: How much longer will the likes of John Isner and Marin Cilic be required to play 22 games in the final set of a Wimbledon match to decide a winner?
